item.title: [cmr] Angel of the Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

item.title: [cmr] Fencing Ace
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [cmr] Dispeller's Capsule
item.description:
Artifact

{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Dispeller's Capsule: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Angelic Gift
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature has flying.

item.title: [cmr] Open the Armory
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Make a Stand
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

item.title: [cmr] Iona's Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [cmr] Seraph of Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

item.title: [cmr] Palace Sentinels
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

item.title: [cmr] Orzhov Advokist
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.

item.title: [cmr] Slaughter the Strong
item.description:
Sorcery

Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.

item.title: [cmr] Skywhaler's Shot
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1.

item.title: [cmr] Soul of Eternity
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Soul of Eternity's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.

Encore {7}{W}{W} ({7}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Slith Ascendant
item.description:
Creature — Slith

Flying

Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Triumphant Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Squad Captain
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Squad Captain enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Trusty Packbeast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Aven Surveyor
item.description:
Creature — Bird Scout

Flying

When Aven Surveyor enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Put a +1/+1 counter on Aven Surveyor.

• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Aqueous Form
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Azure Fleet Admiral
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Azure Fleet Admiral enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

Azure Fleet Admiral can't be blocked by creatures the monarch controls.

item.title: [cmr] Body of Knowledge
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Body of Knowledge's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

You have no maximum hand size.

Whenever Body of Knowledge is dealt damage, draw that many cards.

item.title: [cmr] Prosperous Pirates
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [cmr] Daring Saboteur
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.

Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

item.title: [cmr] Scrapdiver Serpent
item.description:
Creature — Serpent

Scrapdiver Serpent can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

item.title: [cmr] Scholar of Stars
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Sailor of Means
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [cmr] Skilled Animator
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

item.title: [cmr] Skaab Goliath
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards from your graveyard.

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

item.title: [cmr] Thirst for Knowledge
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

item.title: [cmr] Strategic Planning
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Spontaneous Mutation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Trove Tracker
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Trove Tracker dies, draw a card.

Encore {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Corpse Churn
item.description:
Instant

Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Bladebrand
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Elvish Doomsayer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

When Elvish Doomsayer dies, each opponent discards a card.

item.title: [cmr] Dhund Operative
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [cmr] Defiant Salvager
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Artificer

Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.title: [cmr] Feast of Succession
item.description:
Sorcery

All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn. You become the monarch.

item.title: [cmr] Eyeblight Assassin
item.description:
Creature — Elf Assassin

When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Gilt-Leaf Winnower
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

When Gilt-Leaf Winnower enters the battlefield, you may destroy target non-Elf creature whose power and toughness aren't equal.

item.title: [cmr] Miara, Thorn of the Glade
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [cmr] Maalfeld Twins
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

item.title: [cmr] Murder
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Pride of the Perfect
item.description:
Enchantment

Elves you control get +2/+0.

item.title: [cmr] Supernatural Stamina
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

item.title: [cmr] Revenant
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Viscera Seer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Boarding Party
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

Haste

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [cmr] Burning Anger
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target."

item.title: [cmr] Champion of the Flame
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Trample

Champion of the Flame gets +2/+2 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
